choices: Anka stomps into the tent. (Body Odor/Feet)
Corra strides up next to you. (Gas)
The ladies all come in to greet you. (Sleepover)
1.content:
It's dark. A figure enters your tent with a torch in his hand and begins to light the primitive lamps inside as your pupils dilate and you find your disorientation slowly fading away. A gruff, Tauren voice emanates from the figure.

"You're not leaving tonight. The local Alliance diplomats have been...slow to respond to our requests. In the meantime, we're running low on resources, and you're gonna help us pay for that."

You can hear several feminine, yet beastly giggles from outside of the tents.

"Have some friends waiting outside for you. Say they never got to have fun with one of the Alliance. And they're paying well. They'll be joining you shortly."

The tent's entrance flap is suddenly pushed open. Your lady of the night is here.
1.title: Misery Loves Company

choices: Maybe it's best not to anger her. Play it cool and agree.
Probably screwed either way. Might as well keep your dignity and disagree.
11.content:
You raise your head to meet eyes with a heavily plated Orc female who intently returns your stare with a sly, unpredictable grin. From what you can tell, her skin is a light olive tint under her armor, while her rather long hair settles over her shoulders in jet black drapes. She's got to be pretty fit to carry all that steel over her shoulders. Maintaining that same devious smile, she begins to speak.

"So, I hear you're a small game hunter... you little coward, you. Can't win in a balanced match of combat in strength against someone like me, so you take your battle to mere beasts. Pathetic," Anka violently spits. You cringe at her fiery temper and look away. "Warriors, mercenaries, soldiers such as myself... we are the ones that hold real honor. Do you disagree?"
11.title: Anka stomps into the tent. (Body Odor/Feet)

choices: "I bet you'd like to take a look at my battle scars..." (Armpits)
"I guess I'll just make myself comfortable..." (Feet)
112.content:
You slowly shake your head in disagreement, and her smile reverses into a discontent frown. "Really. Well, let me give you a couple of reasons why you're wrong," she calmly responds while removing the heavy armor from her body. She tosses her breastplate a couple of feet away from you and it hits the ground with a clamor. She really is as strong as you thought, when you see the distinct curves of her muscles defined by the amber lamp lights. You catch a foul whiff of what smells like stale cheese. You haven't bathed in days thanks to this hitch in your hunting expedition, and it would be reasonable to assume that you were getting ripe. But the smell intensifies.

"We ALWAYS, wear our armor. Rain or shine. Day or night. Hot or cold," she utters. The smell is still here, but it's becoming less and less recognizable to you; something in here must be giving it off. "We hardly have time for the," she bitterly starts,"luxuries others have such as cosmetics, and cleanliness." She's walking towards you now, and that smell begins to aggressively invade your own breathing air. And then, you've finally put the pieces together as soon as she's looming right back over you, her dagger-like smile returning like an omen from hell. "But we don't take as much pride in killing as much as we do making the enemy submit to our will," she says with the very same sadistic expression that you had seen in the beginning.

That faint scent from before had turned into a hulking stench of sour body odor that assaulted your nostrils so offensively that you might have tried voluntarily retching if there wasn't a thick rag in your mouth. You hold your composure and take short breaths through your nose. You can't keep this up, and she knows it. "You're starting to look a little green around the gills now, what's the matter?"
112.title: A Convincing Argument

choices: She removes your gag, making you kiss and lick her pits.
She brings in some friends to help in her torture.
She moves on to torturing you with her feet.
1121.content:
The orc warrior chuckles and crouches down before raising her left arm, sending a blast of horrid smelling air in your direction. You start retching into your gag. She rolls her eyes. "I'd expected for you to be able to handle this better. I will admit, however, that a struggling victim is far more amusing." She devilishly grins before lowering her armpit into your face. and rubbing it roughly into it, coarse hair brushing against your nose.

You resist the urge to pass out right then and there, as the wretched stench of her smelly, disgusting armpit invades your nose. It smelled like rotten onions and musk, and her sweat was being smeared across your face as well.

After about 2-3 minutes of this, she raises herself back up, smirking with her hands upon her hips as she heartily laughs at your traumatized expression. "Hahaha! I may just have to steal you away from your captors myself." She was heavily entertained by your reactions, and decided that she wanted more.

"Let's make this... more interesting."
1121.title: Arms Raised

choices: Anka makes you smell her feet.
Anka decides to do something else.
1122.content: With most parts of her plate armor off, Anka sits down on the floor, right in front of you. You can see drops of sweat running down on her green skin... Even though it's night right now, it is still pretty hot in this tent. The strong smell of her sweat is still assaulting your senses, as she grins at you evily again, moves her feet, the only bodypart with her plate armor still on, closer to you. "So, you've not nothing to say, huh?" You try to remove the rag in your mouth by shaking your head and pushing it with your tongue, but unsurprisingly, it won't come out. "Hehe, alright then... I guess I'll just make myself comfortable..." She looks at you again, while moving her hands slowly towards her plate boots. Immediatly, you stare at her armored feet. They must be huge... And seeing how much Anka is sweating right now, you're sure her feet won't smell too pleasant. But there's nothing you can do, so you just watch. Anka slowly grabs her boots and starts pulling. The boots aren't moving much, but then Anka uses more power and quickly throws her plate boots away. With a heavy "clonk", they land somewhere in the tent, but you're only paying attention to her feet. Just as you expected, they are huge. It's not very surprising, since Anka is pretty big too, but... Even for an orc, her feet seem enormous. You were also right when you thought they would be sweaty, her light green colored soles are actually wet with footsweat, some drops are slowly dropping to the ground. You didn't think her feet would be so... pretty, though. Even with their big size, they look nicer than some human womans feet you've seen. They are nicely shaped and her soles appear really smooth... But then, the stench of her feet hits you with its full force. An extremely hot, moist and sweaty stench invades your nostrils. It smells pretty much like a mix between really old cheese and vinegar. And it's so intense that you cough a little behind your rag. You hold your breath and try to move your arms or legs once again. But no chance, you are tied up way too well. You take another breath through your poor nose and the thick, cheesy stench of her sweaty, unwashed feet hits you again. You're feeling dizzy and totally weak already. If she makes you smell those things... you would pass out for sure, it's only a question of time. "Haha, I knew you would enjoy this! Does it smell nice, hmm? Let's see... what are we going to do next?" Anka licks her green lips and wiggles her big toes in excitement.
1122.title: Anka's feet

11221.content:
Lying down, she shoves her right foot right into your face. The bare, rough sole of moist flesh, nearly covers your entire face, pushing you head back as this green wall of savage foulness invades your nose like thousand spears, making your eyes water and your consciousness fade.

She then kicks you hard with her left foot, the sharp pain keeping you awake as she keeps rubbing her feet into your face.

“Stay awake” she growled: “I want you to memorize this scent!”

You were forced to breath in her stench, as she kept rubbing it up and down.

“That’s it, remember this scent, the scent of your master.”

With half-lid eyes, you were somewhere between consciousness and unconscious, as her smell kept lingering.

“Hunters like you should know about marking one’s territory… rubbing, grinding, and befouling our prey… until it reeks of you…. Telling everyone who smells you that you’re mine.”

You whimpered, fearing that fact that you will smell like her forever. Frighten that no soap or ethanol could wash off her foot odor, as she kept rubbing it in to you.

“Oh, hush! Better you get used to it! I am going to use you as my personal foot cleaner! Having you lick my feet after a long hard day would be such a luxury, all the other girls will be so jealous of me… perhaps I could even share you with them?”

It was hard to think straight anymore, her fetid foot was clouding your brain as she kept rubbing them into your face, it was then that you felt yourself slowly getting an erection.

“Oh, look at that” Anka cooed: “Such a good boy, already showing submission to its master.”
11221.title: Anka makes you smell her feet.

choices: Anka removes her boot in the last second, allowing you to regenerate a bit.
Anka doesn't remove her boot, knocking you out instantly.
11222.content:
Anka hesitates for a bit, with her huge and warm foot dangling dangerously close to your face. She watches you wince in agony as the strong, cheesy aroma of her feet spreads further and further. Soon, the thick, steamy vapour of footsweat is covering your entire head, with every breath you take through your tortured nose, you can feel your strengh strength fading more and more. You believe that if you are forced to inhale the horrible fumes of her feet for much longer, you will eventually pass out. And you are sure that if you get these huge feet pushed right into your face, you wouldn't be able to last one minute.

However, Anka has also realised that, as she slowly draws her feet a bit back from you, she speaks with a mocking voice: "My, my... You really can't take the smell of my feet, can you? You humans never fail to amuse me with your weakness. But your stamina is particularly low; Most of the humans so far could at least stomach my feet for about ten minutes or so before blacking out. To be fair, though, I have to admit that the smell is extremely strong today, even for my standards. Anyway, I want you to sniff them for some time, and I don't want you to pass out instantly while doing so! Don't worry, I have a good idea how to make you get used to the smell a bit; This has already worked a few times..."

Anka draws her attention away from you, moving around awkwardly without actually placing her feet on the floor, as not to waste her hard-worked sweat on it, as she clearly wants to save that for something else. Somehow, she manages to reach for one of her boots and instantly spins back to you. "Ah there it is! See, you will just have to smell my boot for a while now. Don't worry, these plate boots are pretty much airtight and since I pretty much always run around and have battles in these, the smell should be very similar to the smell of my feet. I tell you now; If you pass out while smelling, you will make me very angry. You do NOT want that to happen. Enough talk for now, enjoy!"

With a slightly sadistic grin, she moves her plate boot closer to you, the opening aimed directly at your face. The smell of them seems to be reaching you by now, it is very close to the stench of her feet (which is also still present, of course), but slightly different. While it has the same deep, cheesy aroma that almost makes your stomach spin, the acidic vinegary-like smell is much weaker in there. Just as you think that this may be a little less dangerous to your sense of smelling, the smell worsens. With every second that passes and every centimetre the boot floats closer to you, the smell seems to multiply.

As your eyes shoot open in terror, understanding that being forced to smell her boot may be much worse than smelling her feet from some distance away, as you did before, Anka gives a loud laugh. "Wahaha! Just look at yourself! With that kind of face, I doubt you will survive this. Oh well, here it comes!"

She continues to move her boot to your face, as it has almost reached it you can actually look inside the boot now. You wish you hadn't seen this instantly, though, as her feet have not only left dark imprints on the soles of the boots, but also a thick layer of sweat that remains there now, glistering dangerously as it draws closer to you. You take a last breath of relatively clean air, but even this sends shivers up your spine and your stomach revolts, you barely avoid the urge to cough and lose all the precious oxygen in the last second.

It really was your last chance, though, as the very next second, the plate boot meets with your face. Anka pushed it right into your face, quite forcefully, and your whole mouth and nose get pushed into and trapped in the opening of the boot, like into the vile abyss of hell, with no possible escape. While you have a bit of breath saved now, you still give a careful whiff, very shallow and small.

The smell explodes in your head as the tainted air rushes through your nose and into your body, a few strange colours dance around your vision as you feel like a hole has been blown in your stomach. The incredibly strong, musky and cheese like smell of unwashed feet and lots of sweat rushes through you, making feel you just as dizzy and lightheaded as before, if not more so. Yes, you are certain now, the smell is stronger right now. Much stronger.

"Ah, what's wrong, did you smell it? I barely noticed anything, surely you can do better than that." Anka taunts you as she grins broadly. The air inside the boot is unbareable. Its hot moisture is laying itself on your skin by now and you shiver in disgust. You shake your head around violently, almost managing to free yourself from the smothering boot on your face, but Anka was prepared for that, and she just holds your head in place with her second hand now. "No, you will only stop smelling when I allow you to. Now, smell!"

You are certain you wouldn't stand another sniff. And that would probably mean even worse punishment from Anka. But you also really have no choice, you try to hold your breath, but it runs out surprisingly fast. You try to give a last struggle, but Anka's grip is strong as steel now and you barely move at all. Finally, your body takes over as your nostrils suddenly flare open widely and take a deep, long whiff. "Ah, yes! That's it!" You barely notice the cheerful words from Anka, the smell hits you as hard as a steel mace to the head. The strong, deep foot aroma makes your stomach turn, you can't stop having to cough violently and end up having to sniff the boot rapidly. "Ah, you're already getting into it! Good!" Anka remarks sarcastically. "But remember, should you fall unconscious, your punishment will be harsh."

You are not even sure if she continues to talk. Already, your senses are fading. Your vision starts to blur, every sounds mixes into a strange, static ringing and the only your sense of smell seems to be working wonderfully. You know that if you take another breath, you will be out cold.
11222.title: The feet will have to wait for a bit.

112221.content:
The thick, nauseating smell from inside Anka's boot has already overpowered you, you hold your breath in vain now, tears are streaming from your eyes and your whole body tenses up as you realise you can't keep this up anymore. But at the very last moment before you would have taken the big sniff of doom against your will, the boot is suddenly removed from your face. Even the warm, stuffy air from inside the tent, already tainted quite a bit by Anka seems cool and fresh in comparison to the vile, toxic air from inside her boots. You immediatly take a series of deep sniffs. Maybe a bit too early, as the stench of boot is still quite noticeable, but you manage not to pass out.

Anka loosens her grip on you and your body slumps forward a bit, your head hanging low as you bring your breathing to a more normal rate, your vision returning to normal and dizzy feeling decreasing a bit. "Well, I suppose that has to be enough. At least you managed not to get knocked out, even though it was pathetically short. I doubt that you are much better prepared, but prepare for the real deal!" You don't even pay much attention to her anymore, but suddenly, your vision is filled with some rather big, green toes. You can see the tiny drops of sweat shining on them as they suddenly spread apart, sending a cloud of powerful stench in your face.

You barely avoid to sniff the horrible fumes completely, which would have knocked you out for sure, but even the tiny bit that did manage to sneak into your nose immediatly sends your mind spinning. While it's still the familiar, cheesy smell of sweaty feet, it has a stomach-turning sour note now, coming seemingly from between her toes. You recoil and straighten yourself back up, to at least get these toes a bit out of your face. You stare at Anka's face in horror, who seems amused at your agony, but also somewhat impatient. "Don't you ignore me like that. You know, I have the choice of knocking you out instantly and torturing you for the whole night, or I could at least give you a fighting chance."

Anka starts smiling dangerously, her smile soon transforming into a huge, wild grin as she moves one foot around in circles near your face, waiting for an answer.
112221.title: Finally, the bare feet.

choices: You can't keep this up any longer. You completely become her slave for the night
1122211.content:
It's no use. You would love to say something, but the strange sensation of this huge, threatening looming right in front of your face, and not to mention the intolerable, thick smell it emitted made speech impossible. You simply stare at Anka, your terror-filled eyes quickly switching between her cruel, menacing face and her enormous, but still somehow beautiful foot. After a short time, her patience runs out and she yells "Well, time's over!" Before suddenly extending her foot just a bit more, finally pushing it all over your face.

With horror, you realise that her feet were actually even sweatier than they looked, as she pressed her warm, soft sole on your face, some of the sweat runs slowly all over it. Soon, a second huge, green, sweaty foot appears on your face, and Anka laughs loudly as she rubs them methodically over your face. "You know, those crazy bloodelves had told me about how good it can feel to rub your feet into some lowly prisoner's face. I never really believed them, until now. How silly of me!"

Anka laughed as she started to push her feet a bit more forcefully into your face now. The motions were creating an audible, disgusting noise now, as her sweaty soles got stuck on the skin of your face and then forcefully ripped themselves away, again. "It's about time you actually smell my feet, though, you know..." Anka suddenly said loudly, as the ball of her left foot pressed itself firmly against your lips. Your eyes widened in terror only to see her toes coming closer and closer to your nose and finally starting to wiggle widely underneath it. "You got to really sniff them, you know? Make me hear it!" You take one last desperate attempt to break free, but unsurprisingly, it fails. You only succeed to drain yourself of all your oxygen as you suddenly thrash around in your bonds wildly, failing to knock the feet off your face. "No way to escape, honey..." She whispers, grinning at you sinisterly.

You finally gave in and take a huge breath through your nose, right as her toes are wiggling over it. The intense wave of smell is simply too much, it rushes through your body like a bolt of lightning, the thick, cheesy scent of sweaty feet hitting you like a hammer, it is like physical pain. As your are forced to breathe in again and again, your face turns pale and your eyes start tearing, you feel yourself at the edge of breaking completely. "So... what will it be, then?" Anka suddenly says, pulling her huge, smothering feet back a bit. "Will you finally behave, or shall I knock you out for good?"
1122211.title: Those feet are getting into action

choices: You need to keep your head straight. Ignore her pheromones as much as you can.
Use her sweat as an anaesthetic. Try to numb yourself as much as possible.
12.content:
She moves through the tent's flap with grace and you look up to a tall, azure troll with red eyes and small tusks. Immediately, she giggles and skips to you. She makes eye contact with you and speaks,

"Hello. I'm Jen'zukk, what is your name?"

It's hard to tell if she's being spiteful or just plain stupid as you bob your head in an attempt to bring her attention to your gag.

"Hee-hee, I'm sorry. That wasn't very nice of me. You look a little cold..."

Actually, you were feeling a bit warm, but you stop yourself from shaking your head as you watch the troll unbutton her robe, revealing her rather sizable breasts, and put it around you. It felt humid, and soaked with what you infer to be her sweat. It's awfully musky and strong, but troll sweat has always been a commodity for one reason or another. "Heh-heh-heh, feels good, doesn't it? Let it soak into your pores, it's soothing, trust me." You'd heard about those powerful compounds found in trolls' sweat...pheromones, weren't they?

Doesn't matter. You're being treated to the most therapeutic service in the world, no, the universe! Every musky particle from Jen'zukk was beginning to bond with your own skin, and it was wondrous. "Uh oh. I think I'm getting a little carried away here. Do me a favor, and breathe deeply." Whatever she says. You open your mouth and take a great breath of the air around you --- just as Jen'zukk opens her mouth and releases her breath with a whispering "Hhuhhhhhhhhhhhhh...". You snap back to reality as you take a bountiful amount of a disgustingly hot cloud of bad breath into your nose and mouth. As you coughed over the acrid stink of dead fish, you become repulsed by the treatment that she's putting you under. She's coating you with her own stink!

"I'm sorry. I can't let you fall too much in love with me, now can I?"

This is going to be a weird night.
12.title: Jen'zukk shimmys in. (Sweat/Breath)

choices: Ask her to let another one in
121.content:
The sudden burst of her breath returns you to the reality of your current situation. You have been trapped and now are being used as a plaything by someone you don't even know! Realizing this, you steel yourself and start focusing on trying to resist the foul yet appealing smell coming from this troll.

"What do you want from me? Who are you, and why are you doing this?!" You ask the troll, trying as best you can to look tough and not let her see through you, despite having fallen for her aroma just moments ago.

"My my~ You're a curious one ain't ya? Don'tcha worry about a thing, I'm just here to have fun" She says as she leans forward with her perky bare breasts getting closer to your face again. As they draw closer you remember what she did when she first smothered you with them and pull back as far as you can despite every inch of your being desiring to bury your face in between them again.

This makes Jen'zukk giggle.

"Aww what's the matter? You seemed so happy to enjoy my scent earlier" She says in a strangely sultry tone right as she grabs your cheeks and forces your lips to pucker with one hand and bringing one of her sweaty nipples to your mouth with the other.

"Come on, you know you want to" She says... and you do want to continue with whatever she want to do with you. Despite this, however, you try your hardest to keep your head straight, and so you don't succumb to her seducing aroma.

Jen'zukk sighs at you after seeing your lips won't part.

"Maybe this is not your thing after all" She mentions as she steps back and sits on the chair where she placed her robes earlier, crossing her arms and resting a leg on top of the other. She dangles her upper leg and with this you notice that despite being a troll she is actually wearing some sort of leather shoes that are still encased around her huge two-toed feet.

"What's it gonna be then? You want someone else to play with you, is that it?" Her tone having changed noticeably, so much so that she even sounded disappointed or even... jealous?

"Just so you know, I saw the other two out there, and judging by their looks and what they were saying, you would have it way worse with them, so your choice. At least my sweat is pure." She mentions lastly in an oddly attempted dignified tone this time. Looking at this troll trying to behave like a princess made you realize that she was probably quite jealous indeed.

You ponder on your situation again. Clearly you are trapped and with no way of escaping, both your hands and legs are tied to the chair you're on so probably getting on the bad side of anyone around you is probably not the best of choices... but what if you could get on their good side?

"So? What do you choose?" Jen'zukk asks as she continues to dangle her leg waiting for your response.
121.title: You need to keep your head straight. Ignore her...

1211.content:
"S-stay here" You finally utter "I suppose I'm better off with you"

Jen'zukk's feminine and savage lips twist into a wide smile as she hears you say this.

"I knew you'd come to reason sooner or later. Not like I was gonna let you go without having my fun after all I did to get to play with you anyway!" she laughed as she rose up from the chair to approach you again. Seeing that glistening figure covered in sweat coming closer to you again you simply close your eyes expecting to feel her moist breasts around your face again.

"Well, if I am going to stay here anyway I might as well do as they say while trying to enjoy it" You think to yourself, already too accepting of your position, but all of a sudden you started to feel even warmer than before, was the temperature risi...?

A heavy blow hits the chair right between your legs and just a few centimeters away from your genital area. This made your heart skip a beat and your eyes open widely. You instinctively look down toward your groin only to realize that the front part of Jen'zukk's huge foot was now resting very close to your genitals. After the initial scare you notice something different about her foot now... it was bare, her toes were wiggling happily between your legs... and the stench of those huge blue sweaty toes spreading was so strong it actually reached your nostrils in no time, making your eyes tear a bit.

"Mmmm~ I think I actually made it this time!" She says joyfully more to herself than to you, but you still start looking upwards asking yourself what she was talking about. As you rise your gaze you can see that her body was actually dripping sweat now, where as before it was just glistening because of it. All the way from the top of her foot, through her sexy long legs, her well toned belly, her ever so luscious breasts and her oddly beautiful face, you managed to see more than a few beads of sweat falling smoothly down her body. You could also see she was holding something near her nose.

It was her own shoe.

"Aaaah yes, I definitely got it right this time!" She mentions happily as she inhales the scent of the leather shoe that was covering her foot just moments ago, all the while shooting a direct stare at your reaction with a wide and seductive grin.

You notice that, between the sight going on in front of you and the overwhelming body odor this exotic beauty was emitting, you started to get mesmerized as if some sort of spell had been cast upon you.

You manage to react quickly enough to ask the troll "What... What are you talking about?"

She doesn't stop inhaling to respond "I've been trying to perfect my body warmth spell for a while now. Usually I would generate too much or too little of the heat needed to make me, and only me, sweat this much.

"So the temperature was indeed rising after all" You think to yourself... But if it was rising enough for you to feel it and to make her sweat that much, how come you were not sweating at all?

"Any particular reason as to why your spell doesn't affect me the same way it does to you?" You finally ask.

Jen'zukk takes her shoe away from her face and turns fully to you with a grin that for some reason, shook you to the bone.

"Because I don't want it to" She said simply. "I want that the only scent surrounding us inside this small tent... be mine and mine alone" This last part being told as she spread her arms wide as if she was presenting a spectacle, making her hairless armpits expose more of her hypnotizing body odor.

Something in the way she acted now didn't feel quite right. Was this the same troll who tried to act as a princess only to try to keep you form the others? Was she planning on this from the beginning?

"The smell, of course, is always better when taken directly from the source and up close" Jen'zukk said as she turned to face you again, this time grabbing your chin firmly with her free hand and with a very clear glare of lust in her eyes.
She saw your unconsciously open mouth and decided to exhale the full stench of her breath inside your mouth once more, this time in the form of semi-kiss that, while it wasn't enough for your lips to touch, it was close enough for her long tongue to reach down into yours and use it to push your tongue out of the way so her breath could reach directly into your throat.

This makes you gag unconsciously, and makes her lick her lips in amusement.

"Time to begin" She says directly "What do you want to take first? My dripping breasts again? Or maybe my oozing armpits?"
1211.title: Tell her to stay

choices: You react in time and start willingly sucking those toes.
You are too dazed, she forces her toes into your mouth
12113.content:
You simply shrug nervously at her question.

"You said I didn't have much of a choice here anyways" You respond, which, inexplicably to you, makes her smile widen even more.
"So you accept the situation that you're in?" she asks, staring deep into your eyes.

You try to hesitate, to hold on to what was left of your pride... but for some reason you start to feel unable to refuse her now. While waiting for your response she brings her shoe back to her nose and starts to sniff it loudly as she starts moving her hips doing a very sensual belly-dance.

"Ah... I-I..." you mutter, but before you could even make out something intelligible, Jen'zukk leans forward and grabs your cheeks with a firm grip of her three-fingered hand, making your mouth hold open.

"No more waiting, I'll be taking that as a yes" she says, to which you only gasp in response. "Close your eyes then, I know what you'll be having first." she commands, so you simply do as she says, finding yourself to be too eager to have her sweat all over you for some reason.

Despite the fact that you were not expecting anything in specific, it catches you by surprise that you start to feel a warm and slightly greasy liquid run down your throat. Where did she get a drink to give you? But soon your taste-buds sense that something is not quite right... this drink was salty, and tasted a little bit like... vinegar?

You open your eyes in sudden realization only to confirm your suspicions. Jen'zukk was making you drink her sweat, but not only that, she was pouring it directly from her shoe!

You gag and shiver once you see this, but Jen'zukk keeps a firm grip on you "Shh~ Almost done" she says with a surprising softness in her tone, and with that she slowly pours the last remaining drops of sweat from her shoe only to quickly shut your moth with her hand. "Now taste its remains and feel how my foot sweat slowly slides inside your throat, ally boy." The fact that she didn't let you open your mouth to take in some fresh air with it (or as fresh as the ambient allowed) makes you tremble as you do indeed feel her sweat slide inside you without damping the taste. Your eyes roll back because of how overpowered you feel, but at the same time you feel your arousal increasing inexplicably.

"Aww don't give me that look!" Jen'zukk cooes "You are the one who let me decide, no?" Suddenly you think of the possibility of this woman actually using an incantation to get you like this. Before being captured you would've never agreed to such treatment, but right now you were allowing yourself to be toyed with by this troll... and there were still others waiting to get time with you...

They're a peon short, and they told me they'd be willing to trade two hundred gold for this guy! All we gotta do is take him down there, pick up the coin, and forget about this entire harebrained ransom plot!"

Reektotem Post... you'd been hearing some stuff about this place. People saying it was some kind of all-girl clan of the Horde. Saying that about ten travelers a month got kidnapped and taken there as slaves. Saying that the guys that came out of there got messed up in the head. In strode a vulpera. They were a relatively new addition to the Horde. Whilst their appearance looked cute and harmless, they'd quickly established themselves as cunning thieves and saboteurs, raising all kinds of hell for the Alliance. At least goblins had the decency to explode when infiltrating your bases.

She pointed it at your face, then your crotch. The mad little creature giggled before putting her weapon away and leaning in real close. By now you could smell the animalistic funk radiating off her person. It stank like a stable on a summer's day.

"Already scared of little me? Good. Most people in your position have more of a spine than that, but none have maintained that silly resolve once I introduce my little friends." She cackles gleefully as she let out a sharp whistle. Something outside huffed.

The beast opened its maw wide, rancid breath washing over you. But the rumble from deep down its gullet was a warning of what was to come. It unleashed a massive belch, half the camp looking over to the tent producing that cacophonous rumble. They almost pitied the poor fool on the receiving end. The horrid gases from the hippo-like beast's depths stung your eyes and nose. They hit with a gale force so potent you're surprised it didn't blow you away. Drops of spittle rained down all over your face, adding another disgusting layer to the torment. Having settled its rumbling belly for now, the beast went back to smothering you in sweat.

The greasy animal spent a few more minutes soaking you from head to toe before Zarra commanded it to step back so she could take a good look at you. The vulpera smiled from ear to ear, seeing your misfortune written all over your face. You tried to keep strong, but that belch alone nearly knocked you out cold. When your glazed over eyes finally locked onto her she spoke up.

"Bad news, buddy. I just went outside and the others told me your friends haven't responded at all to our ransom demands. Looks like they don't care about you that much..." She mused, a dark tone in her voice. But with the next line it was back to cheery optimism. "...Or they're trying a rescue attempt, which means more Alliance to torment soon. I hope they're all as fun as you. Speaking of which..."
1522.title: A riverbeast, dripping with sweat

info.brief_description: Horde chicks know how to stink.
info.description:
Many Alliance hunters venturing far from their hometowns are able to find plenty of fair game within the vast canyon known as Thousand Needles. Unfortunately, the only game you find here is far from fair. You have recently been knocked unconscious by a Horde scout and subsequently dragged back to one of their various encampments. You have also been bound and gagged in the hopes of a profitable ransom. However, you also have company as a party of Horde ladies decides to stay for the night and treat you to the various aromas and stenches that they take so much pride in.

Anka - Orc Warrior - Specializes in general body odor; from putrid pits to funky feet, she'll have your stomach turning all night as she brashly insults and degrades you.

Jen'zukk - Troll Mage - Specializes in sweat and breath; both of you will be dripping with sweat when this fire magi starts to heat things up. The only thing hotter than her spells and sultry voice, is her noxious breath.

Corra - Tauren Druid - Specializes in farts and belches; a powerful source of aromatic methane, her vile expulsions of gas will literally bring a tear to your eye.

-----------------------------------------------------------------
In case it hasn't been made obvious, this story takes place in the Warcraft universe and can include a variety of spells and professions that are found in-game. Get creative!

If you feel that it would be cool for one of these characters to partake in gross activities outside of their specialty (e.g. on second thought, the mage could do some rather explosive things with her farts), go on ahead and let the ideas flow.

Toilet scenes are more than welcome in either main or additional characters.

Any other fetishes dealing with foul smells are also completely acceptable to portray in additional characters should the desire arise. Try to avoid creating nitpicking chapters, and keep it in the 18+ range for the most part. Otherwise, don't be shy. Come on in and have fun!
info.pretty_title: A Smelly Night With the Horde
